name: Life Boost
description:
Game Demo for the 2022 GameDev.tv Game Jam. Reach the yellow goal by using boosts that are created when you die. Don't die more than the number of times above or its game over!

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Source Code: BlazingDeathWorks/Life-Boost: GameDev.tv Game Jam Submission (github.com)
